price: 26. Markaas Alle ku soo dejiyey xasillooni Xaggiisa ah Rasuulkiisa iyo mu’miniintaba, oo u soo diray ciidammo (malaa’ig ah) aydaan arkayn, oo ciqaabay kuwii gaaloobay.Taasina waa jazada gaalada.
arabic: ثُمَّ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ سَكِينَتَهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ وَعَلَى ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَأَنزَلَ جُنُودٗا لَّمۡ تَرَوۡهَا وَعَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: thumma anzala al-lahu sakīnatahu ʿalā rasūlihi waʿalā al-mu'minīna wa-anzala junūdan lam tarawhā waʿadhaba alladhīna kafarū wadhālika jazāu al-kāfirīna
